headline: Best Buy Canada announces Mat Povse as new president
summary: Best Buy Canada welcomes Mat Povse as the company's new President. Mat, a familiar face within the company, steps into this role after an impressive 11-year journey with Best Buy Canada.

headline: Best Buy: Near-Term Share Price To Be Pressured By Tariff Uncertainty
summary: Tariff concerns have become a real risk that could impair Best Buy's near-term earnings performance. Read why it is safer to remain neutral with BBY stock.
